main event: Observer sighted a red-yellow teardrop-shaped object slightly larger than a grapefruit near Bucks Harbor AFS, Maine.
interesting points: The object was visible for 1-3 minutes before it disappeared., The observation was not investigated according to regulations., The local Air Force Base was requested to re-investigate but has yet to respond., No physical evidence or photographs were collected from the sighting., The object had a pulsing characteristic and moved in a straight line before vanishing.
witness description: Airman 2C stationed at Bucks Harbor APS, Maine.
